title: My photos showed in the camera preview "circle" but dissappeared when I selected.
content:
I performed these steps:
1) double clicked power button to open camera app
2) captured 4 or 5 images
3) single click power button, pocketed phone
4) received call, answed
5) during call went to photos, captured images not shown
6) switched to camera app, one of the photos was in screen preview circle in corner
7) selected photo, it opened, then disappeared to photos page
8) opened trash, photos not there.

so, where did my photos go?
